quotes: From 1998 to 1999, Ma headed an information technology company established by the China International Electronic Commerce Center
In 1999, he quit and returned to Hangzhou with his team to establish Alibaba
In October 1999 and January 2000, Alibaba won a total of a $25 million foreign venture seed capital
Since 2003, Ma established Taobao Marketplace, Alipay, Ali Mama and Lynx
From 1999, Ma was executive chairman of Alibaba Group
At the annual general meeting of shareholders for Alibaba.com in May 2010, Ma announced Alibaba Group would begin in 2010 to earmark 0.3% of annual revenue to environmental protection
